short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a companion to the Ultra OTP web app. Use this extension to quickly and securely access otps in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Ultra OTP extension allows users to quickly and securely access and create one-time-passwords in Chrome.

Using standard Web Crypto protocols, sensitive token data (issuers, labels, and secrets) is securely encrypted and decrypted by the client. All data is securely stored in an encrypted cloud database.
